awd_titl_txt: A Supplemental Contribution to the 1990 Gordon Research     Conference on Tribology to be held at Holderness, Plymouth, New Hampshire, June 25-29, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: Support is provided to enable graduate students and                             researchers without travel support to attend the bi-annual                      Gordon Research Conference on Tribology.  The topic of the                      conference is "Recent Advances in Microscopic and Macroscopic                   Tribology".  The conference attempts to bring together, in                      an informal environment, the two major sub-cultures of the                      tribology community: researchers who approach the subject                       from the traditional macroscopic point of view and                              researchers who employ recently developed microscopic and                       atomic-level techniques of observation and modeling.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
